class.name: nodelets_os/OusterSensor
class.description: A nodelet that connects to an Ouster sensor and publish incoming imu and lidar packets to other ros nodes.

class.name: nodelets_os/OusterReplay
class.description: A nodelet that can load up existing Ouster recordings and replay them.

class.name: nodelets_os/OusterCloud
class.description: A nodelet that process incoming Ouster lidar packets and publishes a corresponding point cloud.

class.name: nodelets_os/OusterImage
class.description: A nodelet that processes Ouster point clouds and publish them as depth images.
